item.title: Using Machine Learning to Predict Customer Churn
item.description: For the last year between my day job and family life Iâ€™ve been doing the edx Data Scientist certification, which has a strong focus on Machine Learning principles. The content and code stepped it up a level vs general analysis and sharing visualisations - now that I have completed this course I can honestly say automated machine learning is the way to go.
